tool.name: Generate gene to transcript map
tool.help:
Trinity_ assembles transcript sequences from Illumina RNA-Seq data. This tool produces a file containing correspondance between gene ids and transcript ids based on the name of transcripts assembled by Trinity. The output file is intended to be used by the "Align reads and estimate abundance" tool. The same file is automatically generated when running Trinity, this tool is only intended to be used when you don't (or no longer) have access to the one produced by Trinity.
.. _Trinity: http://trinityrnaseq.github.io
